title: Deep Learning from Scratch in Modern C++
description: It is needless to say how relevant machine learning frameworks are for research and industry. Due to their extensibility and flexibility, it is rare to find a project nowadays not using Google TensorFlow or Meta PyTorch.

title: Google’s Find My Device will soon use billions of Android devices to locate your stuff
description: Beautiful ... unethical ... dangerous. You've turned every cellphone in Gotham into a microphone.

title: Google’s answer to ChatGPT is now open to everyone in US, packing new features
description: Great, let's race to the singularity so as to please our stockholders.

title: How to use Hugging Face Models with Semantic Kernel
description: With this integration, you can leverage the power of Semantic Kernel combined with accessibility of over 190,000+ models from Hugging Face. This integration allows you to use the vast number of models at your fingertips with the latest advancements in Semantic Kernel’s orchestration, skills, planner and contextual memory support.

title: Leak of MSI UEFI signing keys stokes fears of “doomsday” supply chain attack
description: I've got an MSI graphics card. I guess this means I can never again install new graphics drivers for this computer.

title: Microsoft skips pay hikes this year amid sharp focus on AI
description: *please don't have companies follow their lead*please don't have companies follow their lead*

title: Quickly build high-accuracy Generative AI applications on enterprise data using Amazon Kendra, LangChain, and large language models
description: Generative AI (GenAI) and large language models (LLMs), such as those available soon via Amazon Bedrock and Amazon Titan are transforming the way developers and enterprises are able to solve traditionally complex challenges related to natural language processing and understanding.

title: Should take just 5 mins right? RIGHT!?
Today's Windows 11 update. What a dog's breakfast!
description: I'm late to the party. Have Windows 11 updates not been a dog's breakfast yet?

title: Vast says it will launch its first space station in 2025 on a Falcon 9
description: This vehicle is like: What if SpaceX had a customer who had a reason to develop Dragon XL before NASA or SpaceX did?

title: Wendy's to begin replacing drive-thru staff with AI chatbots
description: Look, if an AI says I want nine sweet teas instead of one Diet Coke, that's a sacrifice I'm willing to make to our AI Overlords.

title: Why Developers Are Flocking to LLaMA, Meta’s Open Source LLM
description: When it comes to generative AI, the open source community has embraced Meta AI’s LLaMA (Large Language Model Meta AI), which was released in February.
